patthana16.46:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana16.46:0.3_0: There are immediately effective, inviting inspection, relevant, so that sensible people can know it for themselves.
patthana16.46:1.1_0: There is no way for the sake of unconfusedness.
patthana16.46:1.1_1: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
patthana16.46:1.1_2: doesn’t cause any desire, affection, infatuation, thirst, and calculation.
patthana16.46:2.1_0: Not take pleasure in such a way that gives rise to confidence.
patthana16.46:2.1_1: Not take pleasure in such a way that gives rise to confidence.
patthana16.46:2.1_2: Nor cause or condition for the sake of unconfusion.
